author: dinomuuk
content: hi sorry for silly question. the "secret" we submit must be in numbers? or anything will do?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: depends on the client, you can submit anything on the website (it will turn your input into a number anyway)

author: trent_vanepps
content: can be letters or numbers, most important is that it should have some random characters that you can't remember. the secret should be discarded!
